lenovoXCCAlertMIB.name: lenovoXCCAlertMIB
lenovoXCCAlertMIB.contactinfo: Lenovo Postal: 1009 Think Place Morrisville, NC 27560 USA Tel: +1 (919) 968-4465 E-mail: snmp@lenovo.com
lenovoXCCAlertMIB.description: This MIB is used by the XCC to define traps for Alert conditions detected by the management firmware.

altDateTime.name: altDateTime
altDateTime.description: Timestamp of Local Date and Time when alert was generated

altPriority.name: altPriority
altPriority.description: Alert Severity Value - Critical Alert(0) - Non-Critical Alert(2) - System Alert(4) - Recovery(8)

altTest.name: altTest
altTest.description: This event generated for test purposes.

altFailingFRUs.name: altFailingFRUs
altFailingFRUs.description: Ordered list of Failing FRU Numbers, separated by commas.

altHostMTM.name: altHostMTM
altHostMTM.description: Machine Type and Model for failing host.

altAuxData.name: altAuxData
altAuxData.description: Auxiliary data that may be included for some events.

lenovoSpTrapHdC.name: lenovoSpTrapHdC
lenovoSpTrapHdC.description: Critical Alert: Hard disk drive failure.

lenovoSpTrapRdpsC.name: lenovoSpTrapRdpsC
lenovoSpTrapRdpsC.description: Critical Alert: Redundant Power Supply failure.

lenovoSpTrapHardwareC.name: lenovoSpTrapHardwareC
lenovoSpTrapHardwareC.description: Critical Alert: Other Failure - refer to Message ID for specific condition.

lenovoSpTrapRdpsN.name: lenovoSpTrapRdpsN
lenovoSpTrapRdpsN.description: Non-Critical Alert: Redundant Power Supply failure.

lenovoSpTrapHardwareN.name: lenovoSpTrapHardwareN
lenovoSpTrapHardwareN.description: Non-Critical Alert: Warning - refer to Message ID for specific condition.

lenovoSpTrapOsToS.name: lenovoSpTrapOsToS
lenovoSpTrapOsToS.description: System Alert: OS Timeout value exceeded.

lenovoSpTrapAppS.name: lenovoSpTrapAppS
lenovoSpTrapAppS.description: System Alert: Application Alert. Refer to Message ID for specific condition.

lenovoSpTrapPFAS.name: lenovoSpTrapPFAS
lenovoSpTrapPFAS.description: System Alert: Predictive Failure Analysis(PFA) information.
